title: Fish pie parcels
ingredients: ['55g salted butter', '1 large shallot, sliced thinly', '50ml vodka', 'juice of 1/2 lemon', '400g mixed fish (i.e. cod, haddock, salmon, pollock)', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '150ml to 200ml full fat milk', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'chopped fresh flat leaf parsley, to taste', 'chopped fresh chives, to taste', '375g puff pastry']
